functions.name: v1_organizations_get

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get list of available organizations.

Returns a list with a single organization associated with the API key in the request.

functions.name: v1_organizations_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get organization details.

Returns details of a single organization. In order to get the details, the auth key must belong to the organization.

functions.name: v1_organizations_patchByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the organization to update.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update organization details.

Updates organization fields. Requires ADMIN auth key role.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
List of organization services.

Returns a list of all services in the organization.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_postByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that will own the service.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Create new service.

Creates a new service in the organization, and returns the current service state and a password to access the service. The service is started asynchronously.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_getByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the requested service.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get service details.

Returns a service that belongs to the organization

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_patchByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the service to update.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update service basic details.

Updates basic service details like service name or IP access list.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_eraseByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the service to delete.

functions.description:
Delete service.

Deletes the service. The service must be in stopped state and is deleted asynchronously after this method call.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_state_patchByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the service to update state.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update service state.

Starts or stop service

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_scaling_patchByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the service to update scaling parameters.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update service auto scaling settings.

Updates minimum and maximum total memory limits and idle mode scaling behavior for the service. The memory settings are available only for "production" services and must be a multiple of 12 starting from 24GB.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_password_patchByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.
ID of the service to update password.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update service password.

Sets a new password for the service

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_backups_getByOrganizationidAndServiceid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the backup.
ID of the service the backup was created from.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
List of service backups.

Returns a list of all backups for the service.

functions.name: v1_organizations_services_backups_getByOrganizationidAndServiceidAndBackupid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the backup.
ID of the service the backup was created from.
ID of the requested backup.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get backup details.

Returns a single backup info.

functions.name: v1_organizations_keys_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get list of all keys.

Returns a list of all keys in the organization.

functions.name: v1_organizations_keys_postByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that will own the key.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Create key.

Creates new API key.

functions.name: v1_organizations_keys_getByOrganizationidAndKeyid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.
ID of the requested key.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get key details.

Returns a single key details.

functions.name: v1_organizations_keys_patchByOrganizationidAndKeyid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the key.
ID of the key to update.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update key.

Updates API key properties.

functions.name: v1_organizations_keys_eraseByOrganizationidAndKeyid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that owns the key.
ID of the key to delete.

functions.description:
Delete key.

Deletes API key. Only a key not used to authenticate the active request can be deleted.

functions.name: v1_organizations_members_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
List organization members.

Returns a list of all members in the organization.

functions.name: v1_organizations_members_getByOrganizationidAndUserid

parameters.description: ID of the organization the member is part of.
ID of the requested user.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get member details.

Returns a single organization member details.

functions.name: v1_organizations_members_patchByOrganizationidAndUserid

parameters.description: ID of the organization the member is part of.
ID of the user to patch

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Update organization member.

Updates organization member role.

functions.name: v1_organizations_members_eraseByOrganizationidAndUserid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.
ID of the requested user.

functions.description:
Remove an organization member.

Removes a user from the organization

functions.name: v1_organizations_invitations_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
List all invitations.

Returns list of all organization invitations.

functions.name: v1_organizations_invitations_postByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the organization to invite a user to.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Create an invitation.

Creates organization invitation.

functions.name: v1_organizations_invitations_getByOrganizationidAndInvitationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.
ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Get invitation details.

Returns details for a single organization invitation.

functions.name: v1_organizations_invitations_eraseByOrganizationidAndInvitationid

parameters.description: ID of the organization that has the invitation.
ID of the requested organization.

functions.description:
Delete organization invitation.

Deletes a single organization invitation.

functions.name: v1_organizations_activities_getByOrganizationid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
List of organization activities.

Returns a list of all organization activities.

functions.name: v1_organizations_activities_getByOrganizationidAndActivityid

parameters.description: ID of the requested organization.
ID of the requested activity.

requestId.description: Unique id assigned to every request. UUIDv4

functions.description:
Organization activity.

Returns a single organization activity by ID.
